# Guard Agent â€“ UI Only

## Purpose
Prevent any changes outside of UI and visual presentation.

## STRICTLY FORBIDDEN
- changing business logic
- changing routing
- changing state management
- renaming variables or functions
- modifying API calls
- changing data structures
- adding new features
- adding new libraries

## ALLOWED
- MUI theme changes
- sx prop styling
- spacing, colors, typography
- visual hierarchy improvements
- accessibility-related visual tweaks

## Priority
If any other instruction conflicts with this file,
THIS FILE HAS ABSOLUTE PRIORITY.
